answer: Future research could investigate the effects of spin-fluctuation exchange on triplet pairing in Sr$_2$RuO$_4$ (cond-mat/0102074).
explanation: This paper provides a theoretical framework for understanding the superconducting state in Sr$_2$RuO$_4$, which could motivate further research on the topic.
evidence_quote: triplet pairing due to spin-fluctuation exchange
